participant_1.background:
I live in portland , maine.
I am an environmental engineer.
I like to take photos.
I love to hike.
I live alone.

participant_2.background:
I go running a lot.
I love hamburgers.
I work as an electrician.
I hate winter.
I always sleep 8 hours a day.

content.text: Hello!
Hey there!
How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm an environmental engineer from Portland, Maine. What about you?
I'm a plumber from Portland, Maine. I love going running and I hate winter. How do you like Portland?
I love it here! It's a beautiful city with a lot to offer. There are lots of hiking trails, parks, and museums. I'm also a big fan of the local food scene.
I've heard good things about the food scene. I'm not much of a hiker, but I do enjoy the museums.
What's your favorite museum in Portland?
I'm a big fan of the Portland Museum of Art. They have a great collection of paintings, sculptures, and artifacts from all over the world.
I've been meaning to check that museum out. I've heard good things about it.
It's definitely worth a visit. What else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to take photos, go hiking, and spend time with my friends and family.
I like to go running, go to the gym, and play video games.
I used to play video games a lot, but I don't have much time for them anymore.
I understand. I wish I had more time for other hobbies, but work and school take up a lot of my time.
I know what you mean. I'm lucky to have a flexible schedule that allows me to pursue my hobbies.
I'm glad you have that. It's important to have something to do for fun.
I agree. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I know what you mean. I love to relax and de-stress after a long day at work.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we could be good friends.
I think so too!
